allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add File Set Manager tool for JetBeep Fleet API

- Create new File Set Manager tool for managing Fleet API file sets
- Add comprehensive web interface with Bootstrap 5 UI
- Implement file browsing, upload, edit, and delete functionality
- Support multiple file uploads with batch processing
- Add image preview functionality with hover zoom effect
- Support file types: screenImage, uiScriptBin, uiScriptData, screenFont
- Implement configuration persistence in localStorage
- Add search and filtering capabilities
- Include detailed README documentation
- Update main toolkit landing page with File Set Manager card

Features:
- Browse and navigate file sets from Fleet API
- Upload single or multiple files of same type
- Edit existing files with PATCH endpoint
- Delete files with confirmation
- Preview images with thumbnails and full-size modal
- Hover to zoom image thumbnails (6x magnification)
- Save/load/import/export configuration
- Real-time toast notifications

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
